alert.note: Alert for Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:52PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Malheur County through 430 PM PDT... At 351 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Schoolhouse Hill, or 21 miles north of McDermitt, moving northeast at 25 mph. The storm will move across US Highway 95 around 400 PM PDT. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Basque Station around 500 PM MDT. Overshoe Pass around 520 PM MDT. Bowden Hills and Peacock Lake around 530 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
